page.title: 06THE MIGHTY SHIRES
page.content: My uncle Ted breeds shire horses.He has got 27 altogether,5 males and 22 females.They cost between 500 to 5000 pounds.He has got 8 foals and the first one was born on the 8th of April 1985.They each eat 7lbs of oats and 10lbs of hay.Shire horses do not mind sharing a field with any other sorts of animals.The tallest shire horse is Kathy, she is 18 hands that is 76 inches which is about two metres in height. Shire horses are not just black and white they can be brown,beige,grey or white.My uncle Ted has often been kicked by them. The shire horses only wear horse shoes when they are working but they do not pull carts any more.When the foals are born they are registered and then they are given a name.
